original: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyeṇa sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ |
analyzed: śubham vimokṣam kāyeṇa sākṣātkṛtvā upasampadya viharati iti tṛtīyaḥ

original: teṣāṃ dvāvaśubhasvabhāvau prathamau tadākāratvād bhūmitaśca tau sasāmantakayoḥ prathamadvitīyayordhyānayordhyānāntare ca |
analyzed: teṣām dvau aśubha svabhāvau prathamau tad ākāra tvāt bhūmitaḥ ca tau sa sāmantakayoḥ prathama dvitīyayoḥ dhyānayoḥ dhyāna antare ca
sa sāmantake caturthe dhyāne śubhaḥ vimokṣaḥ
ca ca alobha svabhāvaḥ eva na tu aśubha ātmakaḥ
tat śubha ākāra pravṛtta tvāt
sa parivārāḥ tu ete pañca skandha svabhāvāḥ
catvāraḥ vimokṣa ākhyā samāhitāḥ
nirodha ākhya samāpattiḥ vimokṣaḥ kathitā uṣṭamaḥ

original: catvāro'nye vimokṣāḥ samāhitāḥ kuśalā evārūpyāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ |
analyzed: catvāraḥ nye vimokṣāḥ samāhitāḥ kuśalāḥ eva ārūpyāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ
saṃjñā vedita nirodhaḥ tu aṣṭamaḥ vimokṣaḥ
vaimukhya arthaḥ hi vimokṣa arthaḥ
sarva sa ālambana pravṛtti vaimukhyāt
tasyāḥ tu saṃmukhībhāvaḥ sūkṣma sūkṣmāt anantaram
trividham hi bhāva agrikam cittam saṃjñā sūkṣma sūkṣma ākhya bhedāt
etat yathākramam audārikam

original: ataḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmākhyaṃ bhavāgrānantaraṃ tāṃ samāpattiṃ samāpadyante |
analyzed: atas sūkṣma sūkṣma ākhyam bhava agra anantaram tām samāpattim samāpadyante
tathā samāpannānām tu
vyutthāna cittam api asyāḥ svam śuddham nirmalam tu adhas
sa āsrava anāsrava tvāt
tad vyutthāna cittasya
ced vyuttiṣṭhate bhāvāgrikeṇa
anāsraveṇa ced ākiñcanya āyatana bhūmikena
atha eva vimokṣāḥ kim viṣayāḥ
kāmāvacara dṛśya arthāḥ vimokṣāḥ prathamāḥ trayaḥ
kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram eṣām ālambanam yathāyogam aśubhataḥ śubhataḥ ca
anye tu anvaya dhī pakṣa sva ūrdhva duḥkha ādi avekṣiṇāḥ
ārūpya vimokṣāṇām sva bhūmi ūrdhva bhūmikam duḥkham ālambanam tad hetu nirodhau ca
sarva ca anvaya jñānam apa
mārgaḥ ūrdhva adhara bhūmi saṃgṛhītaḥ
a pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ ca
uktāḥ vimokṣāḥ
vimokṣa adhika vṛtti etat citta aiśvarya pradarśakam

original: sūtre bhagavatā aṣṭau abhibhvāyatanānyākhyātāni “adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇadurvarṇāni khalu rūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti,
analyzed: sūtre bhagavatā aṣṭau abhibhvāyatanāni ākhyātāni adhyātmam rūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇa durvarṇāni khalu rūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti
abhibhūya paśyati
evam saṃjñī ca bhavati idam prathamam abhibhu āyatanam

original: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyapramāṇāni suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvadidaṃ dvitīyamabhibhvāyatanam |
analyzed: adhyātmam rūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati apramāṇāni suvarṇa durvarṇāni iti vistaraḥ yāvat idam dvitīyam abhibhvāyatanam

original: evamadhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahī rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānyapramāṇāni ceti catvāri |
analyzed: evam adhyātmam arūpa saṃjñī bahī rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni apramāṇāni ca iti catvāri
adhyātmam arūpa saṃjñī eva ca bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīla pīta lauhita avadāta
